Name: Flint
About the game: Flint is a good bird, try to help your baby birds to survive the dangers of a bird's life, Flint is a game for kids where you need to overcome yourself and try to get the highest score. A fun adventure for kids. 5 levels about a bird's life. Cute and very colorful drawings. Survive and be the best good bird.
